```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
tokens_topics$word = tagTokens(tokens_topics$word, tokens_topics$topic)
html = ''
for(aid in unique_ordered_aids){
  art_tokens = tokens_topics[tokens_topics$aid == aid,]
  art_meta = meta[meta$id == aid,]
  art = buildArticle(token=art_tokens$word, art_tokens$id, art_tokens$topic, aid, art_meta$headline, art_meta$medium, art_meta$date)
  html = paste(html, art, '\n\n', sep='')
}
cat(html)
```
